# Utilities for the prioritizr R package

The [prioritizr](www.github.com/prioritizr/prioritizr) 
[R](https://cran.r-project.org/) package provides unparalleled flexibility 
for creating conservation planning problems. This package contains the 
source code that [prioritizr](www.github.com/prioritizr/prioritizr) uses 
for creating and solving problems.
